Question: From 1993–2009, this person ranked higher than Leno in the annual Harris Poll of Nation's Favorite TV Personality 12 times.
Hints: This person and Regina Lasko started dating in 1986.
In 1992, Johnny Carson retired, and many fans believed that this person would become host of The Tonight Show.
A self-described average student, this person later endowed a scholarship for what he called "C students" at Ball State.
